content: {A灵光一现}It's said that Oumuamua appears in the dreams of every planet, listening to the sounds of all things as they grow and connect, and answering the calls of every hope and dream.
info: 第五瓶露卡-莫白_主流程文本II

content: Ah, you're awake, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>. You look quite refreshed, hoho. Did you have a pleasant dream?
info: 第五瓶露卡-莫白_主流程文本II

content: Perhaps the good fortune from your dream found its way to this planet. This jar of <style=Highlight>Luca</style> is now full! Please, take it and use it to water the Luca Sapling.
info: 第五瓶露卡-莫白_主流程文本II
